response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, but I understand its potential worth to you is even greater. I am offering it to you for $1,100,000, a price I believe strikes a fair balance between the intrinsic value of the product and its perceived value to you. I am confident this investment will yield substantial returns for you. Should you require any additional information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1100000}
